game.name: Orbiteers
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, 음량 개별 조정, 마우스 전용 옵션, 퀵타임 이벤트 없이 플레이 가능, 수시 저장, 스테레오 사운드, Steam Cloud, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Design efficient space stations across the solar system in this minimalist puzzle-builder. Solve unique challenges with help from your assistant L.U.N.A., optimize your builds, maximize your score, and lead humanity’s journey beyond Earth!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Design efficient space stations across the solar system in this minimalist puzzle-builder. Solve unique challenges with help from your assistant L.U.N.A., optimize your builds, maximize your score, and lead humanity’s journey beyond Earth!
